messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	parameters = {'eventDate':self.view.custom.date}
	data = system.db.runNamedQuery('GPPCA/Select from Remote DB',parameters)
	self.props.data = data

config.script:
import traceback
	
	try:
	
		time = system.date.now()
		time = system.date.format(time, "yyyy-MM-dd HHmmss")
		time = str(time)
		table = self.parent.parent.parent.getSibling("table").getChild("Table").props.data
		csv = system.dataset.toCSV(dataset = table, showHeaders = True, forExport = True)
		system.perspective.print(csv)
		filename = 'GPPCA transactions' + ' ' + time + '.csv'
		system.perspective.download(filename, csv)
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.text = "GPPCA transactions downloaded to CSV file"
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.textStyle.classes = 'Device/Status/Text/On'
		
	except:
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.text = "Cannot download GPPCA Transactions to CSV file"
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.textStyle.classes = 'Device/Status/Text/Faulted'
		
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh-table')

import csv
	import traceback
	try:
		
		file_name = event.file.name	
		file_path = 'D:\\GPPCA\myExports\\' + file_name
		event.file.copyTo(file_path)
		content = event.file.getString() #filedata
		#system.perspective.print(content)
			
		 # Check if this file has just been uploaded - to stop a double import (potential platform/browser bug)
		if file_name <> self.custom.fileName:
			# Call the import function on the table
			#	self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").importCSV(filename, filedata)
			self.custom.fileName = file_name
		
			# start db transaction
			txID = system.db.beginTransaction('ODSPRD', timeout=10000)
		
			# insert new records in the table
			query = "INSERT INTO GPPCA_SCADA_EVENT_stage (DATA_EVENT_TYPE, BAY_NUMBER, TERMINAL, METER_READING, ENERGY_CONSUMPTION, AIRCRAFT_CODE, CORRELATION_ID, EVENT_DATE, EVENT_TIME) VALUES {values}"
			
			# open selected csv file
	#		csvFile = open(file_path, 'rU')
			#system.perspective.print(csvFile)
		
			csvData = csv.reader(open(file_path)) #opening csv file
					
			header = csvData.next() #reading first cvs row
					
			# Create a dataset with the header and the rest of our CSV.
					
			dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(header, list(csvData)) #converting cvs to dataset
			pyDataset = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(dataset)  #converting dataset to PyDataset
			
			args = []
			values = []						
											
			for row in pyDataset:
				eventType = row["Event Type"]
				bay = row["Bay"]
				terminal = row["Terminal"]
				meterReadings = row["Meter Readings"]
				energyConsumption = row["Energy Consumption"]
				aicraftCode = row["Aricraft Code"]
				correlationID= row["Correlation ID"]
				date = row["Date"]
				time = row["Time"]
				#insert data into sql table
				values.append("(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)")
				#string = str(date)
				date1 =  system.date.parse(date, "dd-MMMM-yy") # getting date format from string
				date2 = system.date.format(date1, "dd-MMMM-yy") #formating date for the Remote Database format
				
				args.extend([eventType, bay, terminal, meterReadings, energyConsumption, aicraftCode, correlationID, date2, time])				
	
			system.perspective.print(args)
			
			system.db.runPrepUpdate(query.format(values=", ".join(values)), args, 'ODSPRD', tx=txID)
			system.db.commitTransaction(txID)
			system.db.closeTransaction(txID)
			

			self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.text = "GPPCA Transactions uploaded from CSV file"
			self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.textStyle.classes = 'Device/Status/Text/On'
			system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh-table', scope='page')
		else:
			self.custom.fileName = ''
				
	
	except Exception, e:
		tb = traceback.format_exc()
		system.perspective.print(tb)
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.text = "Cannot upload GPPCA Transactions from CSV file"
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.textStyle.classes = 'Device/Status/Text/Faulted'
			
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh-table', scope='page')

tooltip.text: Execute GPPCA script for checking Database
